name: team ESPN win rates with multiple different matchup_opponent_type params
description: Test that ESPN team win rate columns with different matchup_opponent_type params create distinct table aliases and join correctly
expected_query: with "current_week_opponents" as (select "h" as "nfl_team", "v" as "opponent" from "public"."nfl_games" where "year" = ${constants.current_season.year} and "week" = ${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_week} and "seas_type" = '${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_type}' union select "v" as "nfl_team", "h" as "opponent" from "public"."nfl_games" where "year" = ${constants.current_season.year} and "week" = ${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_week} and "seas_type" = '${constants.current_season.nfl_seas_type}') select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, player.current_nfl_team as player_nfl_teams_0, "t23f8087ef193e4aef5a2bc0caa5c5c79"."run_block_win_rate" AS "espn_team_run_block_win_rate_0", "t2a95f0970e095d57e66836490a3775cf"."run_stop_win_rate" AS "espn_team_run_stop_win_rate_0", "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "current_week_opponents" on "player"."current_nfl_team" = "current_week_opponents"."nfl_team" left join "espn_team_win_rates_index" as "t23f8087ef193e4aef5a2bc0caa5c5c79" on "t23f8087ef193e4aef5a2bc0caa5c5c79"."team" = "player"."current_nfl_team" and "t23f8087ef193e4aef5a2bc0caa5c5c79"."year" = 2025 left join "espn_team_win_rates_index" as "t2a95f0970e095d57e66836490a3775cf" on "t2a95f0970e095d57e66836490a3775cf"."team" = "current_week_opponents"."opponent" and "t2a95f0970e095d57e66836490a3775cf"."year" = 2025 where player.pos IN ('TEAM') group by player.fname, player.lname, player.current_nfl_team, "t23f8087ef193e4aef5a2bc0caa5c5c79"."run_block_win_rate", "t2a95f0970e095d57e66836490a3775cf"."run_stop_win_rate", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 5 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
